forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
